item.title: Research
item.description: a.author{ color: grey; } a.primary{ font-weight: bold; } Refereed Publications Jose Barreiros, Houston Claure, Bryan Peele, Omer Shapira, Josef Spjut, David Luebke, Malte Jung, Robert Shepherd; Fluidic Elastomer Actuators for Haptic Interactions in Virtual Reality, IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters, None, February, 2019.
